metadata.name: LÃ¡grimas de olvido en el Mar Memoria II
metadata.description:
This artpiece is part of the collection of seahorses was created for altruistic and physical sale at the international and immersive exhibition "Caballitos de Mar" in October 2022 in Los Alcazares, Murcia, and which were created to support the improvement and recovery of the ecosystem of the Mar Menor, Spain.
The series consists of seven seahorses, digital paintings that were created in Procreate with a 12.9" Ipad Pro.
The text in Spanish means "Tears of oblivion in the Mar Memoria" and refers to the fact that we have abandoned the flora and fauna of this unique ecosystem in Europe, so much so that seahorses can no longer be seen in these waters, hence the tears shed by the seahorses, and by us, to the sea, as we seem to have abandoned them to their fate.
Seven unique pieces converted today into crypto-art.
